name: Gas Station & Car Service Sim
description: Play Gas Station Car Service Mechanic game and drive cars to refill fuel and auto repair at the service station. Drive tow truck to rescue vehicles out from mud and accident spots.You are legitimate employee to provide such car services like wash, detailing, filing fuel and park cars with your master driving skills.your duty is to drive different vehicles and do gas filling, washing cars at wash center and park on parking point.
